comments.content:
Seems to be a typeface named 'Ibrahim', but, I have not found any digital version, yet, by that name..   
_( Ill post a scan / sample, within the next few minutes.. )_
I think that [Giorgio](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053303/http:/www.identifont.com/show?629) is the original name.

Thanks, Ignacio.. Looks like thats the one..   
_'Georgio'.. Nice ID..   
   
( Hmm.. Well, I still dont know for sure, which one may be the original name, but this should be the one you were seeking, Christophe.. )_

You are very welcome David, and I am not so sure about the original name, at least it is the name   
it has in the wonderful Phil's Homage to the Alphabet Typeface Sourcebook.
